mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT bd_no, bd_title, bd_content, bd_date, b.employee_id AS "writer.employee_id", name AS "writer.name" FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY bd_date desc ) a )

select * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT bd_no, bd_title, bd_content, bd_date, b.employee_id AS "writer.employee_id", name AS "writer.name" FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY bd_date desc ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN start_row(#{currentPage}, #{cnt_per_page}) AND end_row(#{currentPage}, #{cnt_per_page})

SELECT bd_no, bd_title, bd_content, bd_date, b.employee_id AS "writer.employee_id", name AS "writer.name" FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE ${category} LIKE '%${word}%' ORDER BY bd_no desc
SELECT bd_no, bd_title, bd_content, bd_date, b.employee_id AS "writer.employee_id", name AS "writer.name" FROM board b JOIN employee e ON b.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE b.bd_no = #{bdNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bd_no, employee_id, bd_title, bd_content) VALUES('BD'||BD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{writer.employeeId}, #{bdTitle}, #{bdContent})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE bd_no=#{bdNo} AND employee_id=#{writer.employeeId}
